The Latest Item Rock Shrimp Ten-Don

Make a reservation and get this pleasant blend of tempura-fried rock shrimp, egg, and onions atop a bed of rice. Great after your glass of sake.

The Place Kiraku $$

2566B Telegraph Ave
Berkeley, CA 94704
